a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Figure illustrates capital intensity; the ratio of total capital stock over total hours worked and labor productivity; the ratio
of GDP over total hours worked. Both measured in 2010 US$ ppp per hour.
Data source: Bergeaud, A., Cette, G. and Lecat, R. (2016)
